c74object.name: pdm.scale.validate

inlet.description: Any signal input triggers the validation of the scale intervals in the intervals buffer.

outlet.description: Outputs 1 if the scale intervals are properly ordered (ascending), 0 if they are not.

c74object.description: Validates that a scale intervals buffer contains properly ordered intervals. The object checks that each interval in the buffer is greater than or equal to the previous interval, ensuring the scale is in ascending order. This validation is essential before using scale operations like fitting or transposition.
c74object.digest: Validate that scale intervals are properly ordered.
